title: Uninstall
content:
CRITICAL
```
pm uninstall --user 0 com.google.android.gsf
pm uninstall --user 0 com.google.android.gms
pm uninstall --user 0 com.google.android.ims
pm uninstall --user 0 com.android.vending
```
